languages.text:
Requires Overseer to have Hereticus — 5
Servo Skull has +20 Fellowship and Intelligence
Enemies Under Surveillance fail all checks against Overseer.

traits.locale_text:
Requires Overseer to have Hereticus — 5
Servo Skull has +20 Fellowship and Intelligence
Enemies Under Surveillance fail all checks against Overseer.

languages.text:
Requires {g|Encyclopedia:SoulMarkCorruption}Heretical{/g} — Zealot
The servo-skull swarm gains +20 {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerFellowship}Fellowship{/g} and {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerIntelligence}Intelligence{/g}.
Enemies that are {g|f:a115669547864ccc816f0598a404e816}under surveillance{/g} automatically fail all tests against the Overseer.

languages.text:
Требуется: {g|Encyclopedia:SoulMarkCorruption}Еретик{/g} — фанатик
Рой сервочерепов получает +20 к {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerFellowship}Общительности{/g} и {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerIntelligence}Интеллекту{/g}.
Противники {g|f:a115669547864ccc816f0598a404e816}под наблюдением{/g} автоматически проваливают проверки, спровоцированные надзирателем.

languages.text:
{g|Encyclopedia:SoulMarkCorruption}異端者{/g} ― 狂信者が必要
サーヴォスカル・スウォームは+20の{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerFellowship}FEL{/g}と{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerIntelligence}INT{/g}を得る。
{g|f:a115669547864ccc816f0598a404e816}監督下{/g}の敵は、監督官に対するすべての判定に自動的に失敗する。
languages.original_text:
Requires {g|Encyclopedia:SoulMarkCorruption}Heretical{/g} — Zealot
The servo-skull swarm gains +20 {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerFellowship}Fellowship{/g} and {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerIntelligence}Intelligence{/g}.
Enemies that are {g|f:a115669547864ccc816f0598a404e816}under surveillance{/g}, automatically fail all tests against the Overseer.

traits.locale_text:

{g|f:a115669547864ccc816f0598a404e816}監督下{/g}の敵は、監督官に対するすべての判定に自動的に失敗する。

languages.text:
Erfordert {g|Encyclopedia:SoulMarkCorruption}Ketzer{/g} – Eiferer
Der Servoschädel-Schwarm erhält +20 {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerFellowship}Gefolgschaft{/g} und {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerIntelligence}Intelligenz{/g}.
Sämtliche Proben von Gegnern {g|f:a115669547864ccc816f0598a404e816}unter Beobachtung{/g} gegen den Aufseher misslingen automatisch..
languages.original_text:
Requires {g|Encyclopedia:SoulMarkCorruption}Heretical{/g} — Zealot

languages.text:
{g|Encyclopedia:SoulMarkCorruption}Kâfirce{/g} — Bağnaz kanaati gerektirir
Hizmelet sürüsü, +20 {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerFellowship}Sosyallik{/g} ve {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerIntelligence}Zekâ{/g} niteliği kazanır.
{g|f:a115669547864ccc816f0598a404e816}Gözetim altındaki{/g} düşmanlar, otomatik olarak Gözetmen'e karşı yaptıkları tüm testlerde başarısız olur.
languages.original_text:
Requires {g|Encyclopedia:SoulMarkCorruption}Heretical{/g} — Zealot
The servo-skull swarm gains +20 {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerFellowship}Fellowship{/g} and {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerIntelligence}Intelligence{/g}.

traits.locale_text:
{g|Encyclopedia:SoulMarkCorruption}Kâfirce{/g} — Bağnaz kanaati gerektirir
Hizmelet sürüsü, +20 {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerFellowship}Sosyallik{/g} ve {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerIntelligence}Zekâ{/g} niteliği kazanır.
{g|f:a115669547864ccc816f0598a404e816}Gözetim altındaki{/g} düşmanlar, otomatik olarak Gözetmen'e karşı yaptıkları tüm testlerde başarısız olur.

languages.text:
Requiert {g|Encyclopedia:SoulMarkCorruption}Hérétique{/g} — Zélote.
L'essaim de servocrânes reçoit un bonus de {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerFellowship}Sociabilité{/g} et d'{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerIntelligence}Intelligence{/g} de +20.
Les ennemis {g|f:a115669547864ccc816f0598a404e816}sous surveillance{/g} échouent systématiquement à tous leurs tests contre le surveillant.
languages.original_text:
Requires {g|Encyclopedia:SoulMarkCorruption}Heretical{/g} — Zealot
The servo-skull swarm gains +20 {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerFellowship}Fellowship{/g} and {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerIntelligence}Intelligence{/g}.
Enemies that are {g|f:a115669547864ccc816f0598a404e816}under surveillance{/g} automatically fail all tests against the Overseer.

traits.locale_text:
Requiert {g|Encyclopedia:SoulMarkCorruption}Hérétique{/g} — Zélote.
L'essaim de servocrânes reçoit un bonus de {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerFellowship}Sociabilité{/g} et d'{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerIntelligence}Intelligence{/g} de +20.

languages.text:
Requiere {g|Encyclopedia:SoulMarkCorruption}Hereje{/g}: Fanático
El enjambre de servocráneos gana +20 de {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerFellowship}Empatía{/g} e {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerIntelligence}Inteligencia{/g}.
Los enemigos que estén {g|f:a115669547864ccc816f0598a404e816}bajo vigilancia{/g} fallan automáticamente todas las pruebas que realicen contra el supervisor.
languages.original_text:
Requires {g|Encyclopedia:SoulMarkCorruption}Heretical{/g} — Zealot

Enemies that are {g|f:a115669547864ccc816f0598a404e816}under surveillance{/g} automatically fail all tests against the Overseer.

traits.locale_text:
Requiere {g|Encyclopedia:SoulMarkCorruption}Hereje{/g}: Fanático
El enjambre de servocráneos gana +20 de {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerFellowship}Empatía{/g} e {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerIntelligence}Inteligencia{/g}.
Los enemigos que estén {g|f:a115669547864ccc816f0598a404e816}bajo vigilancia{/g} fallan automáticamente todas las pruebas que realicen contra el supervisor.

languages.text:
需要信念：{g|Encyclopedia:SoulMarkCorruption}异端主义{/g}——狂热者
伺服头骨集群的{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerFellowship}社交{/g}、{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerIntelligence}智力{/g}提高20点。
处于{g|f:a115669547864ccc816f0598a404e816}一览无余{/g}状态的敌人在进行对抗监察官的检定时，所有检定自动失败。
